Name: bvidal
AboutMe:
When I graduated I was a Java boy but I learned Python in my first job and since then it has become my favorite language. Batteries included, plethora of third party modules, syntactic sugar, large community and the Zen of Python make for a superb language.

I am a strong believer in code quality and review, testing and continuous integration coupled with an agile methodology to deliver a high quality product.

I thrive in teams where I can learn and get challenged every day as well as teams where I can add my own grain of sand to the mix of ideas.

SOreadytohelp
